Element UI Layout Column

Source: R/el_layout.R
el_col.Rd

Element UI Layout Column

Usage

el_col(
  ...,
  span = NULL,
  offset = NULL,
  push = NULL,
  pull = NULL,
  xs = NULL,
  sm = NULL,
  md = NULL,
  lg = NULL,
  xl = NULL,
  class = NULL,
  style = NULL
)

Arguments

...

Content or other Element UI components

span

Column span (1-24)

offset

Offset columns

push

Push columns

pull

Pull columns

xs

Responsive xs

sm

Responsive sm

md

Responsive md

lg

Responsive lg

xl

Responsive xl

class

CSS class

style

CSS style
